name: Whamazon
description:
This game was made for LCAD's 2021 Hot Jam. It is an absurdist racing game lending light commentary on the harsh demand we and the company put on amazon workers.

Game Credits

Luke O'Connor: 3D Artist, World Builder, Lighting Artist, Game Designer

Srayan Jana : Lead Programmer

Janelle Leavins: Programmer, UI

Sabella Hunter: 2D Art, UI, Tile Creation
